member.name: ID3D11VideoContext2.VideoProcessorGetOutputHDRMetaData
member.summary: Gets the HDR metadata describing the display on which the content will be presented.
member.param: The type of HDR metadata supplied.

param.name: Size
param.para: The size of the memory referenced by pHDRMetaData.
If pHDRMetaData is NULL, Size should be 0.

param.name: pMetaData
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that receives the HDR metadata.
This parameter can be NULL.

member.name: ID3D11VideoContext2.VideoProcessorGetStreamHDRMetaData
member.summary: Gets the HDR metadata associated with the video stream.
member.param: The type of the HDR metadata currently associated with the stream.

param.name: Size
param.para: The size of the memory referenced by pHDRMetaData.
If pHDRMetaData is NULL, Size should be 0.

param.name: pMetaData
param.para: Pointer to a buffer that receives the HDR metadata.
This parameter can be NULL.

member.name: ID3D11VideoContext2.VideoProcessorSetOutputHDRMetaData
member.summary: Sets the HDR metadata describing the display on which the content will be presented.
member.param: The type of HDR metadata supplied.

param.name: Size
param.para: The size of the HDR metadata supplied in pHDRMetaData.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_NONE, the size should be 0.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_HDR10, the size is sizeof(DXGI_HDR_METADATA_HDR10).

param.name: pHDRMetaData
param.para: Pointer to the metadata information.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_NONE, this should be NULL.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_HDR10, this is a pointer to a structure.

member.name: ID3D11VideoContext2.VideoProcessorSetStreamHDRMetaData
member.summary: Sets the HDR metadata associated with the video stream.
member.param: The type of HDR metadata supplied.

param.name: Size
param.para: The size of the HDR metadata supplied in pHDRMetaData.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_NONE, the size should be 0.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_HDR10, the size is sizeof(DXGI_HDR_METADATA_HDR10).

param.name: pHDRMetaData
param.para: Pointer to the metadata information.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_NONE, this should be NULL.
For DXGI_HDR_METADATA_TYPE_HDR10, this is a pointer to a structure.
